text: A military leader or commander is a person who leads an army or a people. The term has a strong military use and connotation, but the role or function is sometimes acquired, and sometimes political or religious as well.P. Calchi, Historia Mediolanensis, Milano, 1627.L. della Chiesa, De vita ac gestis marchionum salutiensium libellus, Torino, 1703. == References == Category:Military Category:Military terminology Category:Military leaders
title: Military leader
